name: Grilled Octopus
info: Grilled Octopus is a seafood dish made by cooking seasoned octopus on a grill or over an open flame, resulting in a tender and flavorful dish often served with lemon and herbs

name: Roasted Shrimps
info: Roasted Shrimps is a seafood dish made by seasoning and roasting shrimp in the oven until they are pink and slightly charred, often served with garlic butter or a spicy dipping sauce.

name: Grilled Lobster
info: Grilled Lobster  is a seafood dish made by cooking whole lobsters on a grill or over an open flame, resulting in tender and succulent meat often served with butter or a citrusy sauce.

name: Chanachur
info: Chanachur is a popular snack mix from Bangladesh made with a variety of fried lentils, nuts, spices, and savory ingredients, often enjoyed as a crunchy and flavorful snack.

name: Fuchka
info: Fuchka is a popular street food from Bangladesh consisting of crispy shells filled with spicy mashed potatoes, chickpeas, tamarind sauce, and other flavorful ingredients, often enjoyed as a tangy and delicious snack.

name: Jhal Muri
info: Jhal Muri is a popular street food snack from Bangladesh made with puffed rice, peanuts, spices, and vegetables, mixed with tangy tamarind sauce and mustard oil, often enjoyed as a crunchy and flavorful snack..

name: Kachchi Biryani
info: Kachchi Biryani is a popular traditional Bangladeshi dish made with layers of marinated raw meat and aromatic rice, cooked together in a sealed pot, resulting in a flavorful and fragrant one-pot meal.

name: Ilish Vaja
info: Ilish Vaja is a popular Bangladeshi dish made with fried Hilsa fish, marinated in a blend of spices and served with steaming hot rice and lentil soup, often enjoyed as a traditional and delicious meal.

name: Kala Bhuna
info: Kala Bhuna is a Bangladeshi dish made with black chicken cooked in a blend of spices, onions, and tomatoes, which results in a rich and flavorful sauce.
